settings.Heading: OUR STORY
settings.content:
The Dinner Ladies are Sophie Gilliatt and Katherine Westwood. We got together at the school gate in 2007 and came up with the idea of preparing dinners for time-poor friends and family members so that they woud always have good, homemade food in their fridges and freezers (and incidentally, so would we).
Between us we have seven children and two husbands of varying sizes, appetites and degrees of fussiness - there’s not much we don’t know about pleasing a tricky crowd.
We started cooking in the shed in Katherine’s back yard on a converted trailer and two camp stoves
We’d shop on a Monday, cook on a Tuesday and then one of us would do the delivery run while the other fed and bathed all the kids.

settings.Heading: OUR FOOD
settings.content: We're no longer cooking in the shed – and we’ve got a few more hands on deck in the kitchen now – but we still cook every dish as if we were cooking for our own families:with the best possible ingredients and no added rubbish like preservatives, emulsifiers, thickeners or flavour-enhancers.
